page.title: 19A DAIRY FARMER
page.content:
John Richards is a dairy farmer. He milks twice a day and owns many cows. He starts work at about 7.45am and ends at 10.00pm in the summer. His favourite job is moving the electric fence, while one of his helpers really enjoys driving. John hates fetching the cows in bad weather but generally finds farming an enjoyable job although he finds the milk quota system unfair for people with forty cows. The hardest job is haymaking in the hot summer.John believes that it is harder to start a farm these days and that you need more knowledge than before.
By Barry Harding
